title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-1.2 - Prohibition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-1.2 - Prohibition

State Regulations

No person shall dispose of low-level radioactive waste or
NARM waste in this State except: (a) at a facility permitted pursuant to this Part; or
(b) in accordance with Part 380 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
383-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
